page.title: 10CAISTOR SQUARE- SERVICES
page.content: Most of Caistor's{shops}are around the market place.These include: { Briggs & Sons,}Ironmongers-an old established family business which is at the moment up for sale. National Westminster Bank { R.Clarke's,sweets,tobacco,fancy goods { H.Roberts,}newsagents. Post Office - postmaster,E.Jones. Red Lion,public house. Co-op supermarket . { Selles}Chemist-a local firm with many branches mostly in N.Humberside. { Mr.Bamforth's}Home & Continental { Carrick's}Food & Wine supermarket { M & S Cross,woolshop:Doreen's}clothes { Margaret's,}sweets & tobacco { Mawer,Mason & Bell,}estate agents Caistor Fry,fish & chips{Prop.Mr.Lill Golden Valley,Chinese take away food Cornhouse Cellars restaurant (Prop. {Mrs.M.Furnival)
